original_text: Now therefore perform the doing of it; that as there was a readiness to will, so there may be a performance also out of that which ye have.
korean_text: 이제는 하던 일을 성취할지니 마음에 원하던 것과 같이 완성하되 있는 대로 하라

sentences.original_text: Now therefore perform the doing of it;
that as there was a readiness to will,
so there may be a performance also
out of that which ye have.
